phrs.translation: 可行性研究报告；可行性报告

sentences.sentence: I doubt the feasibility of the plan.
sentences.translation: 我怀疑这个计划的可行性。

sentences.sentence: The committee will study the feasibility of setting up a national computer network.
sentences.translation: 委员会将研究建立一个国家计算机网络的可行性。

sentences.sentence: Work has begun to determine the feasibility of using insects as biological controls, but effective biological controls are considered years away.
sentences.translation: 人们已经开始努力确定使用昆虫作为生物控制手段的可行性，但仍认为有效的生物控制手段还需要数年时间。
